website_summaries.verdict: This clear PVC, envelope-style purse has room for everything you need and then some.
pros: Measures 13.5 inches long by 9.4 inches high by 1.2 inches wide
Comes with golden chain strap that measures 47.2 inches long
cons: May be a bit too large for comfortable use as an evening purse or for sporting events

customer_reviews.title: I recommend for people who like big
customer_reviews.text: Bag is exactly as pictured but is bigger then I expected. i could fit two notebooks in this clutch with a little space still. I recommend for people who like big clutches
customer_reviews.author: cassidy angeles

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Beautifully large bag.
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this purse!! Measured before ordering and was ok with the large size (as many commented as too large). I did return only due to not needing for the trip I ordered it for, however, I may order again at a later time. Really loved this bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great transparent purse but, very large.
customer_reviews.text: This purse is a great transparent purse but, you need to keep in mind that it is very large if you plan to use it as an evening purse. It was too large for me and I love big purses.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Nancy

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only purse allowed inside Beaver Stadium. I can load it up with everything I need. I wish that it were a bit smaller and that the chain were a bit smaller; otherwise, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C. Rotondo

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this see through clutch, it’s large and light. Use it on my vacation to Belize, San Pedro Caye!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mzblac’s

customer_reviews.title: This purse is very large in size...
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this purse I thought it was gonna be very small, boy was I wrong!! It is very big and sturdy. Nice and thick to!! I ordered 2 of these bags, in Silver & Gold. Can't wait to wear them. True to SIZE.
customer_reviews.author: conjai swannigan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how nice this bag looks and how well it’s constructed for the price. I got it for my preteen daughter to use at a football game but will use it myself if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Ameeneh E Langlois

customer_reviews.title: Big and cute !!
customer_reviews.text: I love big purses !!! I love this purse very cute and a all purpose bag
customer_reviews.author: Rakia McCaffity

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute but won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I received a lot of compliments- a bit oversized but cute. Unfortunately the chain strap broke so I can no longer use. I guess I have a clear x-large clutch
customer_reviews.author: Akira Nesfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but very big!
customer_reviews.text: Nice 30 bag, but way too big for just a evening clutch which I was going for.
customer_reviews.author: MsNina💋

customer_reviews.title: H U G E !! 💙
customer_reviews.text: This Purse Is HUGE But I Love It Because I’m Into Large Pauses & This Is So Me !! I Will Take Pics For An Update..
customer_reviews.author: Shauni

customer_reviews.title: Different!
customer_reviews.text: This clutch is classy and different. you can insert any color handbag you want in this clutch. To match what ever color dress, suit, or outfit you're wearing. Please!
customer_reviews.author: Myrtis

customer_reviews.title: large and spacious!
customer_reviews.text: ordered for a concert, LOVE IT! easy to open and close, good length on chain for crossbody, and great size to hold items!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very big blutch purse. Can be compared to the size of the lastest big apple ipad
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: nice clutch
customer_reviews.text: It's large enough to carry the essentials but small enough to carry on my shoulder or under my arms. Goes well with my lucite heels.
customer_reviews.author: moore42

customer_reviews.title: Lucite clutch
customer_reviews.text: A bit large but will probably meet my needs at a future sporting event but not an outing. It remains to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Walker

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love! 😍
customer_reviews.text: Love this clear clutch! It's the perfect size! I thought it was going to be bigger from the reviews but I absolutely adore it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute for Stadium game days
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn it yet, but it's a nice size and really cute
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte G.

customer_reviews.title: Upset with order !!
customer_reviews.text: The purse came on time but the gold chain was not included!! This purse was for my daughters event and now we have to get something else !!
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super large purse if you like that sort of thing which I do :)
customer_reviews.author: Fashionably Cute

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture , wasn’t expecting it Too Be so big
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Love This Clutch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality. HUGE! Just like I wanted! Would def order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexsis Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Received so many compliments. Not to big in my opinion it held everything, perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag Dress it up or down Goes with
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag Dress it up or down Goes with everything
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Great for work at places that requires clear bags
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it except the chain. It's too small for a large person, like me, to use crossbody and it's kinda flimsy, but again I'm very tough on my stuff. I also like that all touch screen devices still work through the plastic so my laziness doesn't have to be taxed too much to play with a tablet
customer_reviews.author: KindleLover

customer_reviews.title: My wife bought this for going to a sporting event ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for going to a sporting event with restrictions on non-clear purses. We couldn't believe how large it was. Definitely not helpful for that specific use.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

product_meta.title: Hoxis Large Size PVC Clear Envelope Clutch Gold Chain Crossbody Bag Women's Purse
product_meta.description:
Our commitment is to offering the latest trends in purses and other first-rate lady bags. Our range of products are for professional or casual use, and we have products for all ages and professions. You will always find that our selection incorporates great design, and quality construction. 

*Fulfilled by ‘Hoxis’, We offer a Standard Delivery service which usually takes 7 to 15 working days for your goods to arrive, from receipt of your Order. However delays are occasionally inevitable due to unforeseen factors. 
The delivery charges are applied and there is one delivery charge per Item. Hoxis delivery charges are $3.99 per item. 
* Official Hoxis product made and sold exclusively by Hoxis, All products includes ‘Hoxis’ Label and Tags, US Trademark Registration Code: 86580316 
*Package: Individual Polybag or Box Packed. 
*Due to monitor variations colors may appear slightly different.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :12.2 x 8.66 x 0.94 inches; 15.2 Ounces
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :November 1, 2016
 * ASIN :B01M5IYQWA

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #397,260 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #175750 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #158 inWomen's Clutch Handbags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars66 ratings

NFL Purse, Turn Lock Closure,Removable Chain Strap
Fit for A4; Large Size:12( L) x 8.5(H) x 1.2(W) inches
Simplicitly Design;Wipe clean;Also,You could DIY Decoration Paster On this Bag

It is very nice design .Each bag is hand cut and carefully to make it by Hand. 100 % handmade .It is very nice clutch, purse for your party and every day. It is a see through bag .Easy to find everything in your bag.
